data.title: Great Breakfast, Fresh Ingredients!
data.text: We wanted to try a new place for breakfast while in the Rockville area on October 16.  We are glad we chose First Watch.  There was a 20 minute wait when we arrived and the place quickly filled up with folks as we were waiting.  Good sign that the food was good.  I had the Frittata Rustica and my 10 year old son had the Chocolate Chip Pancakes.  Our food was made with fresh ingredients, it was hot, and very delicious.  The coffee was amazing!  Best breakfast we've had out in a while and definitely worth trying out the restaurant.  We will be coming back here again!

data.title: Great Breakfast Place!
data.text: During our stay in Rockville, we had breakfast here twice.  Our first visit was on a Sunday and the restaurant was very busy; they have a very organized system to seat customers, take orders and serve the food quickly.  The service was quick and friendly.  One day we each had the Traditional Breakfast; the other day I had the Breakfast Quinoia Bowl and my husband had the Farmhouse Hash.  We both enjoyed our meals there - good fresh ingredients; healthier menu options available; wide variety of choices.

data.title: Great fresh eatery
data.text: This place has breakfast and lunch options throughout the time they are open. Great sandwiches with all fresh ingredients.

owner_response.author: Cassi C, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're happy to hear you love our sandwiches and all the fresh ingredients we use in our dishes. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: We really liked this place.
data.text: They had a very good granola plate and since I am not a big breakfast fan, this worked out very well for me and my entire family.  Everyone was please with the food and the service. There was 5 of us and by the time we got in the door the hos had seen us coming and was waiting with menus in hand. I would recommend this little gem of a place. Decor is very homey.  They have newspapers hanging on a rack for anyone who wants to check out the world news.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Sally! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your granola dish and that your family enjoyed their meals as well. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Get breakfast or lunch before 2 PM
data.text: A solid breakfast choice in the heart of downtown Rockville. They concentrate on fresh food- nothing too fancy. I much prefer the Rockville location to the Gaithersburg one. There are some great little shops to visit after you have your meal.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks, Dayle. We appreciate your visits to our different restaurants. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: I don't understand the hype
data.text: My husband and I are in Rockville for an event, and wanted to go out for a nice breakfast. There were many appealing offerings at First Watch, and the reviews were good. My husband ordered an omelette and I had eggs over potatoes with bacon and onion. We also shared a multi-grain pancake. The coffee was meh. The eggs were fine. The "hash" was okay. The multigrain pancake was huge, as advertised. It was fine. There was nothing wrong. But it was not fabulous, and not worth the $40 we dumped for breakfast.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for coming in with your husband! It's upsetting to know that your breakfast was just mediocre, as that's not what you should expect from First Watch. We take pride in the freshness and quality of all our dishes, and it sounds like we dropped the ball a bit. We've shared your review with our management team, and we hope you two will give us another try!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: looooove this breakfast place
data.text: They have some very yummy healthy plates and juices. There are also your regular home style entrees, too. The food menu changes occasionally and it is always delicious!

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Maryann!! We hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Breakfast!
data.text: I love First Watch - visit whenever possible.  Everything is fresh and cooked to order.  You must have the granola banana pancake!

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Gary!! We love you too!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent spot for Sunday brunch!
data.text: We were short on time but hungry! Our waitress was awesome (wish I had remembered her name) and we were served quickly although the place was packed! Awesome menu...try the cheesecake French toast

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for coming in! We're thrilled that you enjoyed a quick, tasty breakfast at First Watch. See you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Tasty way to start the day
data.text: Interesting and innovative options add a fresh spin to usual breakfast fare.  We liked it so much we went back the following morning - coffee was good and plentiful without having to ask for it.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much! We're glad you enjoyed two tasty mornings at First Watch, and we hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place for noisy Children, if they can stand the wait!
data.text: I went with 6 other people, so there was a long wait on a Sunday. The place is way too noisy, even louder than a school cafeteria. I ordered a Scramble, which I always thought meant eggs MIXED with other items. The eggs were quite dry with items that appeared to be tossed in after the eggs were cooked. Hard to have a conversation. The French Toast with berries was quite nice. There is a nice variety of Breakfast offerings, just not a relaxing brunch.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your recent visit and for this feedback. From start to finish, we sincerely apologize for the experience you describe here. We take our service and food very seriously and it is upsetting to know this is how your visit went. Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns - we will address them immediately. We do hope you give us another try in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Eggs Benedict wonderful!!
data.text: Fast service, and friendly.  We were there on a rainy Wednesday, and was busy and everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves and many seemed to be regulars.  It was our first time and my eggs benedict was so sinful, and good.  Would highly recommend.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for giving us a try! We're glad you enjoyed your Eggs Benedict and that you had excellent service during your visit. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: breakfast
data.text: wide menu of healthy choices for breakfast or brunch. Fast good service but not much atmosphere.Everything is very fresh.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Richard! We're glad you enjoy our wide variety of healthy menu options and fast service. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Healthy and Delicious
data.text: If you want that first meal of the day to sustain you till dinner, First Watch fits the bill. The menu changes periodically, always with a wonderful, seasonal new item. If you want more traditional breakfast fare without relying on healthy alone, their pancakes, waffles and bacon are good, too.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're glad we can provide you with a filling, delicious meal when you come to visit. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Creative, healthy breakfast menu
data.text:
We had a great breakfast--the avocado toast special with two eggs was wonderful and very filling. My husband's omelet was a little dry, he said, and although the menu described a bacon and avocado omelet, there was only a small piece of avocado in it (plenty of bacon, though). The menu had a lot of creative dishes I'd like to try on another visit (different hashes, steel-cut oatmeal).

Service was excellent and prompt.

They open at 7:30 AM. We arrived at 8:15 and by 8:45 there were at least 10 people waiting. They were seating people quickly, but if you're in a rush, plan to get there early.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're glad you enjoyed your Avocado Toast but are sorry that your husbands Omelet was dry and did not have enough avocado inside. It is great to hear that you experienced such great service with us though. We can't wait to see you and your husband again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The place to go for breakfast (or lunch)
data.text: Great non-chain diner style restaurant specializing in breakfast fare made with fresh ingredients.   It appears to have become the go-to place if you want to meet a friend of for morning business meals as well.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review! We're glad you enjoy our food and our fresh ingredients we use in all our dishes. See you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Solid breakfast spot
data.text:
First watch gets very busy on the weekends so be prepared to wait. They have a great variety of pancakes and egg dishes, plus during lunch offer some nice sandwich and salad options. I usually go for the old standby of pancakes with bacon and a bottomless cup of coffee though their egg crepe is also quite yummy!

Kids will be happy too as they have their own menu. Who doesn't love chocolate chip pancakes? 

Service is always very attentive - the staff seem to go out of their way to meet the needs of the customers. Note that it is only open for breakfast and lunch! Oh, and they offer free wifi too. Well worth a visit.

data.title: Noisy crowded busy
data.text: This was my first visit to this breakfast lunch stop. No bookings but by using the app you can use it like 'call ahead'. We were seated in about 20 minutes. I ordered Chickchinga and my wife ordered a grilled vegetable sandwich. The meals came very quickly as if they were partially made. The sauce on my Chickchinga burrito looked a little thick and stodgy but the overall taste of the food was good. My wife liked her meal. Overall it's a good lunch stop if you like noise and fast food

data.title: Friendly staff.
data.text: Had breakfast here 3 days in a row.  The food was good, the service was very good with very friendly staff.  We were staying at the Cambria hotel about 2 blocks away, but their breakfast was too pricey for what you get.  They seem to have a lot of whom the staff knows which also tells me this is a good place for breakfast.

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Bob! We're glad you enjoyed breakfast three days in a row while you were in town. We've shared your review with our management team, and we hope you'll come see us next time you're in town!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Decious food
data.text: The food was amazing, and customer service was ever better. I found the prices to be a little high for my wallet, but I was not paying. Great place though

owner_response.author: Eleni K, Guest Relations Manager at First Watch, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much, Mary! We're glad you love our food and awesome customer service. We're sorry that you are disappointed with our prices, due to the high quality and freshness of our food we try to make our prices as reasonable as possible. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
